intro: Eriopha eriopha, commonly known as the woolly eriopha, is a small flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features dense, woolly silver-gray foliage that gives it a distinctive appearance. Its flowers are typically small and yellow, arranged in a compact cluster. Eriopha eriopha thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or sandy habitats.
